2. Councilmember Matt Sherman

Councilmember Matt Sherman
==========================

![Councilmember Sherman ](https://www.lakeway-tx.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=44387)
Matt Sherman has been a proud resident of Lakeway since 2019, along with his wife and young daughter, who was born in this beautiful city. He and his familyenjoy spending time together at Dragon Park, one of Lakeway’s hidden gems. Matt is an avid mountain biker, enjoys tinkering with cars, and is a commercially rated pilot. Professionally, he works in advertising, where he helps clients maximize their revenue through effective ad sales strategies.

Matt’s commitment to community service began with his role on the Aviation Zoning Committee. Before being elected to the city council, he served as a Commissioner on the Zoning and Planning Commission (ZAPCO) and chaired the 2024 Comprehensive Plan Committee. Currently, Matt serves as one of the council representatives on the 2024 Comprehensive Plan Committee.
His dedication to the community extends to his involvement with various local organizations. Matt is a member of the Lake Travis Trail Coalition and Lakeway Friends of the Parks. Additionally, he has combined his interest in flying with his love for animals by serving as a pilot for Pilots N Paws, an organization that relocates dogs from high-kill shelters to specialized rescue organizations. He also serves on the board of the Lakeway View HOA.
Matt is dedicated to honoring the heritage of Lakeway while helping to shape its future. He is always available to assist residents and local businesses. Please feel free to contact him at
[mattsherman@lakeway-tx.gov](mailto:mattsherman@lakeway-tx.gov)
.
